message: I'm developing an application and calling a web service using DefaultHttpClient() and I have an error because it is a https/ssl
I searched and all the "solutions" fail, somebody know how to trust the certificates?

Hey, i came across this tutorial in a stackoverflow posting while searching around on this issue.  Tutorial: http://blog.crazybob.org/2010/02/android-trusting-ssl-certificates.html    StackOverFlow where i found it: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/995514/https-connection-android#1000205   Hope that helps
